displayReadProgress.label: Read progress
displayReadProgress.description: Display a horizontal line on top of article-pages indicating the length of articles relative to scroll-position. To enable on an article turn read progress on in article settings. If you use a separate article prototype for long-reads you can enable it here. Or you can enable/disable it on any article you choose.

minElementCount.label: Minimum element count
minElementCount.description: Defines minimum number of elements present before the functionality will be applied.

displayReadTime.label: Read time
displayReadTime.description: Display the estimated read time of a article base on how many wordes the text contains. To enable on an article turn read progress on in article settings. If you use a separate article prototype for long-reads you can enable it here. Or you can enable/disable it on any article you choose.

hideReadTimeLabel.label: Hide label for read time
hideReadTimeLabel.description: Label text can be edited in Language options under Dateline

embeddable.label: Embeddable options
embeddable.description: You can allow readers to embed your articles if you activate it here. It must also be activated per article in article settings General/Styling.

displayLogoInLinkToSite.label: Display logo in link to site

hidePublishedDateLabel.label: Hide the label for published date

hideModifiedDateLabel.label: Hide the label for modified date

label.label: Label
label.description: Sets the title for the link to the global changelog page.

url.label: URL
url.description: Sets the URL for the link to the global changelog page.

social.label: Social media sharing
social.description: Select services end users can share your articles through

shareableArticle.label: Shareable paywalled article
shareableArticle.description: Enable paying customers to share paywalled articles to non-paying customers. Must be activated in article settings for the article.

articleApprovalStatus.description: Customize your selection of article approval statuses

sentToDistribution.label: Sent to distribution
sentToDistribution.description: Optional approval status: For paper distribution or similar

description.placeholder: Add your own description, visible in Article Settings -> Article status

typeset.label: Typeset
typeset.description: Optional approval status: Typeset complete or layout design finalized

description.placeholder: Add your own description, visible in Article Settings -> Article status
description.label: Description

dateTime.description:
FormatOutputDescription
YY182 digit year
YYYY20184 digit year
M1-12Month number, beginning at 1
MM01-12Month number, 2 digits
MMMJan-DecAbbreviated month name
MMMMJanuary-DecemberFull month name
D1-31Day of month
DD01-31Day of month, 2 digits
dddSun-SatAbbreviated name of day of the week
ddddSunday-SaturdayName of day of the week
H0-23Hours
HH 00-23Hours, 2 digits
m0-59Minutes
mm00-59Minutes, 2 digits
s0-59Seconds
ss00-59Seconds, 2 digits

embed.description: Used for embed-UI in articles. Must be activated in admin
embed.label: Embed button and popup

label_copy.label: Label for button to copy code

label_content_title.label: Label for checkbox to show title

label_content_subtitle.label: Label for checkbox to show subtitle

label_content_image.label: Label for checkbox to show image

label_content_padding.label: Label for checkbox to add spacing around the embed

text_code_copied.label: Text displayed after code is copied

page_sitelink_prefix.label: Text to appear before the logo at the bottom of the embed

page_sitelink_postfix.label: Text to appear after the logo at the bottom of the embed

title_text.label: Define the title text for the tag page
title_text.description:
This is a template where variables surrounded by two or three brackets, like {{ variable }}, will be replaced by actual data.
Available variables:
VariableExampleResult
tagPath{{ tagPath }}Labels
tag{{ tag }}politics
tags {{ tags }}news,domestic,politics
Note: If the tag page displays several tags the variable tag will display the last one.
Examples:
TemplateResult
{{ tagPath }}: {{ tag }}Labels: politics
{{ tagPath }}: {{ tags }}Labels: news,domestic,politics
Read all about: {{ tags }}Read all about: news,domestic,politics
All about: {{ #tags }}{{ . }} {{ /tags }}All about: news domestic politics

publish.label: Publish
publish.description:
You can format the text using Slack Mrkdwn formatting, based on standard Markdown.
Data from Labrador is available in the variables listed below.

front.placeholder: The front page *{{{ title }}}* is published

notice.description:
Available variables:
KeyTypeExample
titleStringPage title: {{ title }}
url_frontStringUrl: {{{ url_front }}}
url_editorStringUrl: {{{ url_editor }}}
idIntegerPage ID: {{ id }}
typeStringPage type: {{ type }}
hiddenBoolean{{ #hidden }}Published hidden{{ /hidden }}{{ ^hidden }}Published visible{{ /hidden }}
modifiedStringModified date: {{ modified }}
publishedStringPublished date {{ published }}
published_aheadBoolean{{ #published_ahead }}Future published{{ /published_ahead }}
userStringUser: {{{ user }}}

error.label: Error
error.description:
You can format the text using Slack Mrkdwn formatting, based on standard Markdown.
Data from Labrador is available in the variables listed below.

all.description:
Available variables:
KeyTypeExample
isCmsErrorBoolean{{ #isCmsError }}CMS error{{ /isCmsError }}
isViewErrorBoolean{{ #isViewError }}View error{{ /isViewError }}
url_editorStringUrl to page: {{{ url_editor }}}
url_cmsStringUrl to CMS: {{{ url_cms }}}
url_monitorStringUrl to developer monitor: {{{ url_monitor }}}
userStringUser: {{{ user }}}
messageStringError message: {{{ message }}}
stackTraceStringStack trace: {{{ stackTrace }}}

article.label: Options for articles behind paywall, without access

blurAllContent.label: Blur all content (FOR INTERNAL PAYWALLS ONLY)
blurAllContent.description: Will blur all content except header and teaser, and remove possibility to scroll.

hidePlusInMetaTags.label: Hide label on Google and social media

labelPosition.description: Will set default position of paywall label above teaser image

content.label: Name of icon

tracking_id.description: This field can be used for both Universal Analytics (UA) and Analytics 4 (GA4). Want to run both simultaneously? See the help section for more information.

id.description: If an ID is provided, the base URL 'https://cl.k5a.io/' is used.

data.label: Include a footer from a front-page
data.description: Set the id of the page you would like to use as a footer on all your pages. Default settings will use the first row (#0) on the selected page. To disable: Remove the page-id.

addFooterToBurger.label: Show footer at the bottom of the burger menu
addFooterToBurger.description: Will inherit the styling from the footer on the page, but the styling of the hamburger might affect it, and mobile styling will not kick in on small burger on desktop.

tagPagePath.label: Url-path
tagPagePath.description: Set url-path to tag-page. Use slashes before and after the name: "/tag/".

simpleTagSearch.label: Simple tag search
simpleTagSearch.description: Used on article settings when searching for tags. A simple search is faster but do not display number of times each tag is used on a page.

tagsToHide.label: Tags to hide
tagsToHide.description: List of tags to not display on front or in article. Separate by comma.

showHiddenTagsOnFront.label: Show hidden tags on Frontpage
showHiddenTagsOnFront.description: Check to show hidden tags on frontpages.

showHiddenTagsOnArticle.label: Show hidden tags in article
showHiddenTagsOnArticle.description: Check to show hidden tags in articles.

data.description: Set id for Google site search
Labrador CMS label at the bottom of pages
Add custom meta tags, scripts and links in the head section of your pages. Custom scripts can also be added to other parts of your pages.

imageUrlOptions.description: Select image file-type to use. Options: 'jpg', 'webp'
imageUrlOptions.label: Image type

image.label: Pixel density
image.description: Default pixel density factor for images. A value of 2 will produce crisp images on high resolution screens

defaultAspectRatio.label: Default aspect ratio
defaultAspectRatio.description:
Define default format of images.
Ratio = height / width. An image of 1000 x 600 will have a ratio of 0.6 (600/1000)

socialAspectRatio.label: Aspect ratio for social media
socialAspectRatio.description:
Define default format of images for social media.
Ratio = height / width. An image of 1000 x 600 will have a ratio of 0.6 (600/1000)

skipImageInfoAfterUpload.label: Ignore displaying image-info after upload
skipImageInfoAfterUpload.description: The info-panel help user adding image-caption and byline after uploading images

imageBylinePrefix.label: Byline prefix
imageBylinePrefix.description:
Add a prefix to the byline of images, displayed in the caption. Example: 'Photo: '
If used, the prefix will be applied to all your photo bylines. To remove the prefix, delete the text in this field.

showBylineAsTitle.label: Use byline as hover text
showBylineAsTitle.description: Use the byline as the hover text (title) of the image. If unchecked, the image caption will be used.

uploadedFileUrl.label: URL for uploaded main logo
uploadedFileUrl.description: Add URL to an uploaded logo on either external server or uploaded in Labrador's file upload. Must be an .SVG or .PNG file.

logoWidth.label: Width of main logo
logoWidth.description: Set width of logo. Be careful to not set a width that is too large, as it can affect the layout of your header.

uploadedMailmojoFileUrl.label: URL for uploaded Mailmojo logo
uploadedMailmojoFileUrl.description: Add URL to an uploaded logo on either external server or uploaded in Labrador's file upload to use on Mailmojo newsletters. Must be a .PNG file.

data.description: Specify a full url to an image to use as fallback if Labrador cannot generate an image
data.label: Fallback image
Tansa language tools
data.description: Add your license key and server to enable Tansa for this site.

target.label: 'target' attribute
target.description: This will set the default value for the 'Open in new tab' option in the link-tool.

textDirection.label: Text direction
textDirection.description: Defines the direction of text on your site.

enabled.label: Auto font size (text blocking)
enabled.description: This will turn on the auto font size for titles on article teaser on front pages.

data.label: Comment providers
data.description: Here you can set up supported commenting systems for your site(s). Please refer to selected provider for information on how to set up the service.

hideCommentsIfPaywall.label: Hide for paywall
hideCommentsIfPaywall.description: Hide comments for articles behind paywall for users without access

data.label: Plugin management
data.description: Plugins extend editing features in Labrador CMS. Here you can enable and configure plugins for your site(s).

abtest.label: AB Tests
abtest.description: Enable A/B testing for your site. Require Kilkaya Nisa. Contact us at support@publishlab.com to enable.

customer.label: Customer
customer.description: Customer ID for Kilkaya Nisa. Please contact us for more info.

slack_notifier.label: Slack Notifier
slack_notifier.description: Notify a Slack channel when an article, notice or front page is published. Requires a webhook URL from Slack.

options.label: Events
options.description: Set up criterias for when to notify Slack.

value.label: Content value
value.description: Add values to match against. If multiple values are added, only one of them needs to match data defined above for the notification to be sent.

items.placeholder: A value to trigger a notification ...

subrite.label: Subrite subscription services
subrite.description: Contact Labrador CMS to add your subrite token to your site. Turn on 'Active' to make the button visible in the editor.

defaultTitle.label: Default Title
defaultTitle.description: Optional: Sets a default push notification title.

defaultMessage.label: Default Message
defaultMessage.description: Optional: Sets a default push notification body.

buyandread.label: BuyAndRead push notification service
buyandread.description: Configure your BuyAndRead push notification service with your provider ID. Contact Labrador CMS to add your password and username for BuyAndRead.

defaultTitle.label: Default Title
defaultTitle.description: Optional: Sets a default push notification title.

defaultMessage.label: Default Message
defaultMessage.description: Optional: Sets a default push notification message.

excludeParamsDefault.label: Exclude linking article
excludeParamsDefault.description: Check to exclude article links by default.

enabled.label: Aptoma export
enabled.description: This will enable the Aptoma export settings panel.

customTopicSectionString.label: Custom topic and section string
customTopicSectionString.description: This will give you the option to override default topic and section in Aptoma export settings on an article

printArticleTypes.label: Print article types
printArticleTypes.description: Article types to include in print export settings.

multiPublicationEnabled.label: Roxen multi publication export
multiPublicationEnabled.description: This will enable the possiblilty to export to more then one publication at the time.

siteName.label: Site name
siteName.placeholder: Site name, as defined as 'Display name' or 'sitealias' on admin page 'Sites'

prototypeName.label: Prototype
prototypeName.placeholder: Prototype name, as defined on admin page 'Prototypes'

data.label: Auto insert content
data.description: These settings allow you to insert content automatically on articles and front pages. Changes here will affect both existing and new pages.

index.label: Index to insert into
index.description:
Number implies where in the content order the element will be inserted.
One index count equates to one row on the front page. Index 0 will be at the top of the order.

pageId.label: Display elements from page
pageId.description: Find the ID in the URL when editing the page used to create the element.

pageId.label: Display elements from page
pageId.description: Find the ID in the URL when editing the page used to create the element.

conditions.label: Include or exclude insertion in specified articles / pages

value.label: Value
value.description: Ensure the content is or is not inserted to articles with a certain section and or certain tags.

index.label: Index to insert into
index.description:
Number implies where in the content order the element will be inserted.
One index count equates to one row on the front page. Index 0 will be at the top of the order.

pageId.label: Display elements from page
pageId.description: Find the ID in the URL when editing the page used to create the element.

pageId.label: Display elements from page
pageId.description: Find the ID in the URL when editing the page used to create the element.

conditions.label: Include or exclude insertion in specified articles / pages

value.label: Value
value.description:
Ensure the content is or is not inserted to certain pages by using host path.
Example if your page is www.mysite.com/current-affairs, host path is current-affairs.
